scripts.dev-championFan: npm run clear && cross-env APP_KEY=championFan CONFIG_KEY=dev vite --host --open
scripts.dev-championFan-https: npm run clear && cross-env APP_KEY=championFan CONFIG_KEY=dev HTTPS=true vite --host --open
scripts.dev-default: npm run clear && cross-env APP_KEY=default CONFIG_KEY=dev vite --host --open
scripts.build: npm run clear && cross-env APP_KEY=championFan CONFIG_KEY=dev vite build
scripts.push: npm run lint && npm run cspell && npm run clear && git add -A && npx opencommit && git push
